LanguageData.JRWKaprosuchus.label: Kaprosuchus
LanguageData.JRWKaprosuchus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #09372-2009 [KAPROSUCHUS SAHARICUS] CODENAME: CALYDONIAN >391
A mahajangasuchid crocodyliform with a golden, warped hide and a ferocious attitude. Their jaws are built for quickly slamming shut on prey, allowing their unfortunate victims no chance of escape.
